EmailTemplate.name: Rescheduling/Demo Ghosted - Day 30
EmailTemplate.subject: Last call to schedule your Luxury Presence demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName} ,
I’m sending one more quick reminder so you can schedule your demo [Meeting Link] and start elevating your real estate business with Luxury Presence.
We’re the fastest-growing marketing platform for real estate agents and teams—check out our case studies here to see the results we've achieved for other real estate professionals. We’d love to help you find the same success.
Book your demo now: [Meeting Link]
Best, {!User.Name}
